description:
Viscious dire whip, serving its owner with an unbreakable loyalty. Throbs as if it is alive, its bloodlust flows through its wielder who radiates in faint, velvety aura.
* 10% chance to perform Sweeping Strike while attacking. Sweeping Strike deals <color_light_red>16 cutting damage</color> to foes in a very wide cone.
* 20% chance to drain life force from an adjacent foe when hit, dealing up to <color_green>2 biological damage</color> and heals you by <color_green>1</color>.

A thick layer of blood, protecting your body from harm. 'Break' the barrier by dropping it.
* 75% chance for the coat to react, immediately piercing the attacker when hit that deals <color_green>12 stabbing damage</color> and renders them <color_yellow>unconscious</color> for 1-3 turns.

Hemomancer form:
<color_red>Orus</color>, the zealous manipulator.
* 10% chance to summon a <color_light_blue>bloodling</color> near a blood field within 10 tiles for every 20 seconds.
* 10% chance to summon a <color_light_blue>bloodling</color> when hit.
* 20% chance to summon a <color_light_blue>bloodling</color> and 5% chance to summon a <color_light_blue>bloodling predecessor</color> while attacking.

Enshrouds your wielded weapon (or even bare fists) in ghastly mists.
* 5% to summon an <color_light_blue>etherean silhouette</color> for 15-25 turns while attacking.
